Target: reopened for use by airports that met newly improvised security standards

text: Restoring civil aviation . On the morning of September 13 , the national airspace reopened for use by airports that met newly improvised security standards . Reopening the financial markets . After extraordinary emergency efforts involving the White House , the Treasury Department , and the Securities and Exchange Commission , aided by unprecedented cooperation among the usually competitive firms of the financial industry , the markets reopened on Monday , September 17 .
